articles.title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried agrees to be extradited to the US - CNN
articles.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried agreed to be extradited to the United States, where federal prosecutors have indicted him on eight counts of fraud and conspiracy.

articles.author: By Aditi Sangal, Maureen Chowdhury, Elise Hammond, Melissa Macaya and Meg Wagner, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Jan. 6 committee votes to issue criminal referrals against Trump - CNN
articles.description: The Jan. 6 committee voted to approve its final report and the referral of multiple criminal charges against former President Donald Trump to the DOJ during the panel's final public meeting Monday. Watch live and follow the latest news updates here.
articles.content:
The Jan. 6 committee used its final public meeting Monday to summarize its 17-month investigation with a simple closing statement: All roads lead to Donald Trump.
